sentences.en: British collusion in such destruction is a scandal that will outlive any passing conflict.
sentences.cn: 英国共谋此次破坏行动,这种丑行的恶劣影响将超过任何其他短暂的冲突.

sentences.en: Can hedge funds outlive their star managers?
sentences.cn: 对冲基金能否比他们的明星经理人支撑更久?

sentences.en: He will not outlive this night.
I'm sure Rose will outlive many of us.
sentences.cn: 我肯定罗丝会比我们中的很多人长命。

sentences.en: Local people wonder whether the system can, or indeed should, outlive the man.
sentences.cn: 当地人想知道是不是能, 或者说确实应该, 人亡政不息.

sentences.en: Lord, let me never , never , outlive my love for thee.
sentences.cn: 主, 我莫苟且偷生, 如若对你爱减退.

sentences.en: People with outlive everyone else if they take care.
sentences.cn: 只要好好照顾自己,心脏病患者完全可以像正常人一样生活.

sentences.en: She outlived her husband by 20 years.
The world has outlived much, and will outlive a great deal more.
sentences.cn: 世界已经存在了很久, 而且还将更久远地存在下去.

sentences.en: Those who are weakly or who complain of ill health , oft outlive the more robust.
Well, you know, I thought that bastard would outlive us all.
sentences.cn: 好吧, 你知道的, 我曾认为那个私生子比我们都命长.

sentences.en: Which type will outlive the other it is still too early to say.
sentences.cn: 那一种的命长,现在似乎还在不可知之数.

words.tran_cn: 比…活得长；比…经久；经受住；渡过…而存在

trans.tran_en: to remain alive after someone else has died
to remain alive after someone else has died
